snippet.title: The Post-Megapatch Future of SCP: Secret Laboratory
snippet.description:
The suspension of the Megapatch format resulted in a lot of rumors and controversy. Today we're going to talk about the near-future plans regarding SCP: Secret Laboratory, to make sure we're all on the same page!

Play the game for free: http://steamcommunity.com/games/700330/
Webpage: http://scpslgame.com
Mentioned 9.1.0 changelog: https://steamcommunity.com/games/700330/announcements/detail/1723120578722438916

0:03 - Introduction.
0:16 - Quick comment about the Megapatch II release.
1:03 - "What's next?" - description of the new update releasing format.
1:26 - Version 10.0.0 - our next bigger update.
         ^ 1:29 - General information.
         ^ 1:54 - Stamina.
         ^ 2:17 - Status effects.
         ^ 3:03 - A secret feature.
3:19 - Your feedback & questions
         ^ 3:35 - More playable SCPs.
         ^ 4:13 - Procedural map generation system.
         ^ 4:56 - Environmental hazards.
         ^ 5:55 - More SCP items.
         ^ 6:28 - MP3 release date.
         ^ 6:49 - Dev-made plugin support.
7:07 - Ending.

Music used:
-SCP:SL OST - Melancholy (Extended ver)

Voice-over narration by:
  Sam East (Doggdemon)
  Twitch: twitch.tv/doggdemon
  Twitter: @dogg_demon 
  Voice actor and marketing specialist at Northwood


Disclaimer: The video might contain flickering scenes and unfunny jokes.

The video is licensed under the CC-BY-SA 4.0 license - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
